commit message: Moved tag v4.2.1 to changeset 11fb563aa696 (from changeset 647e5e37025f)

Updated GoogleAdMob SDK to 6.1.0
Removed GoogleAnalytics lib
Disabled unused settings manager in MyBackupAgent

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 821d9a48c6095c2b9baa06221ecd7054d75c512a
Split dial command into 2 commands: dial (to compose) and call (to make a call)
UI: Added new Tab Fragment with Connection Status. Has currently only a (very useful) 'Ping' button.
Added files needed to get ABS running with ant
Updated AUTHORS, DONORS and CHANGELOG URLs to new location
Check if intent is null in LocationService. Fixes issue 201
initProject: fix permissions and bash variable
PingButton: Made MainService volatile, hopefully fixes the ping button not working problem
Added some more log output wrt to MainService binding in the MainActivity
initProject: init git submodules on demand
Updated aSmack. Removed XMPP Ping implementation since it's now in (a)Smack.
AndroidManifest: removed reference to com.googlecode.gtalksms.panels.about This panel is gone a long time ago
XmppManager: cleanup and be less verbose on connectionClosedOnError
MainService, XmppManager: readded unintentionally removed imports

MainService NetworkConnectivityReceiver: Improved reconnection logic and WiFi <-> GSM switches. The old implementation would not start a reconnect if there is a GSM -> WiFi switch. I introduced a static String in NetworkConnectivityReceiver that remembers the last known active network. If the active network changes we issue an reconnect.
Updated Changelog: Remark about removed AdMob
